code: import React from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{Lightbulb,ArrowRight}from'lucide-react';import'./Recommendations.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Recommendations=_ref=>{let{recommendations,loading}=_ref;const navigate=useNavigate();if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"recommendations-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"card-title",children:"Recommended for You"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"recommendations-loading",children:"Loading recommendations..."})]});}if(!recommendations||recommendations.length===0){return null;}const handleRecommendationClick=link=>{if(link){navigate(link);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"recommendations-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"recommendations-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Lightbulb,{size:20,className:"recommendations-icon"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"card-title",children:"Recommended for You"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"recommendations-list",children:recommendations.slice(0,3).map((rec,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"recommendation-item",onClick:()=>handleRecommendationClick(rec.link),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"recommendation-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"recommendation-title",children:rec.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"recommendation-description",children:rec.description})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ArrowRight,{size:16,className:"recommendation-arrow"})]},rec.id||index))})]});};export default Recommendations;
